mapper.select: select c.code,c.title,c.credit,c.quota,c.instructor,c.room,c.grade from course c,mj m where c.maj_cd=m.maj_cd and c.grade like CONCAT('%',#{major},'%') and c.grade like CONCAT('%',#{grade},'%')
select c.code,c.title,c.credit,c.quota,c.instructor,c.room,c.grade from course c,mj m where c.maj_cd=m.maj_cd and title like CONCAT('%',#{coursename},'%')
